description:
I think this month is going to have some hot daddy types. Bowen has hot daddy written all over him.
He is married and though I could not get him to admit he was actually Bi. He described all kinds of encounters with men, from topping to being an eager bottom. But since it was 'just sex' with no attachment, it didn't count.
At the age of 30, his sex drive is stronger than ever. He thought he would put it to work doing some porn.
He did have a family emergency so did not stay to do the oral. This actually happened a couple times this month, so I have a few solos without corresponding Serviced videos.
No worries, I always have some back up plans and plenty of eager models wanting to do full-scenes.
The schedule is a little different this month, so be prepared for some Chaos!
title: Bowen - Solo
